mapper.insert: INSERT INTO CHTT_ROOM VALUES ( CHTT_ROOM_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{chttRoomNm}, #{chttRoomTy}, #{chttRoomNmpr}, SYSDATE )
mapper.select: SELECT cr.CHTT_ROOM_NO, cr.CHTT_ROOM_NM, CASE WHEN cr.CHTT_ROOM_TY = 0 THEN ( SELECT UF.UPLOAD_FILE_STRE_NM FROM EMPL E JOIN PROFL P ON E.EMPL_ID = P.PROFL_EMPL_ID JOIN UPLOAD_FILE UF ON P.PROFL_ETPR_CODE = UF.UPLOAD_FILE_ETPR_CODE WHERE P.PROFL_EMPL_ID = ( SELECT CM.CHTT_MBR_EMPL_ID FROM CHTT_MBR CM WHERE CM.CHTT_ROOM_NO = cr.CHTT_ROOM_NO AND CM.CHTT_MBR_EMPL_ID != #{emplId} ) ) ELSE 'ThumbnailForMultiChatRoom.png' END AS CHTT_ROOM_THUMBNAIL, COALESCE(c.CHTT_CN, '(채팅 내역이 없습니다)') AS LATEST_CHTT_CN, COALESCE(c.CHTT_INPUT_DATE, cr.CHTT_ROOM_CREAT_DE) AS LATEST_INPUT_DATE FROM CHTT_ROOM cr LEFT JOIN ( SELECT c1.CHTT_ROOM_NO, c1.CHTT_CN, c1.CHTT_INPUT_DATE FROM CHTT c1 WHERE c1.CHTT_INPUT_DATE = ( SELECT MAX(c2.CHTT_INPUT_DATE) FROM CHTT c2 WHERE c2.CHTT_ROOM_NO = c1.CHTT_ROOM_NO ) ) c ON cr.CHTT_ROOM_NO = c.CHTT_ROOM_NO LEFT JOIN CHTT_MBR cm ON cm.CHTT_ROOM_NO = cr.CHTT_ROOM_NO WHERE cm.CHTT_MBR_EMPL_ID = #{emplId} OR cm.CHTT_MBR_EMPL_ID IS NULL ORDER BY LATEST_INPUT_DATE DESC

SELECT A.EMPL_ID, A.EMPL_NM, A.COMMON_CODE_CLSF, (SELECT C.COMMON_NAME FROM COMMON C WHERE C.COMMON_CODE = A.COMMON_CODE_DEPT) AS DEPT_NM, (SELECT C.COMMON_NAME FROM COMMON C WHERE C.COMMON_CODE = A.COMMON_CODE_CLSF) AS CLSF_NM, UF.UPLOAD_FILE_STRE_NM AS PROFILE_FILE_NAME FROM EMPL A JOIN PROFL P ON A.EMPL_ID = P.PROFL_EMPL_ID JOIN UPLOAD_FILE UF ON P.PROFL_ETPR_CODE = UF.UPLOAD_FILE_ETPR_CODE WHERE A.EMPL_ID != #{emplId}
